001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper;
002
003import com.comphenix.protocol.PacketType;
004import com.comphenix.protocol.events.PacketAdapter;
005import com.comphenix.protocol.events.PacketEvent;
006import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.feature.*;
007import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util.GrassColors;
008import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util.ImageColors;
009import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.ChatPosition;
010import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.CollectionBuilder;
011import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Duration;
012import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Logging;
013import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.Task;
014import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.serializers.ByKeySerializer;
015import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.biome.BiomeInjector;
016import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.plugin.BasePlugin;
017import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.scheduler.PaperScheduler;
018import com.google.common.collect.BiMap;
019import com.google.common.collect.HashBiMap;
020import net.kyori.adventure.bossbar.BossBar;
021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
023import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
024import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurateException;
025import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
026import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper;
027import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
028import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection;
029
030import javax.imageio.ImageIO;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.util.Arrays;
033import java.util.HashMap;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036
037public class DemeterPlugin extends BasePlugin<DemeterPlugin> {
038    public static final int BSTATS_ID = 13021;
039    public static final String PATH_STATE = "state.conf";
040    public static final String PATH_FOLIAGE = "foliage.png";
041    public static final String PATH_GRASS = "grass.png";
042    public static final String PERMISSION_PREFIX = "demeter";
043
044    // TODO do not attempt to do anything if no foliage/grass imgs found
045
046    private final BiMap<String, ChatPosition> chatPositions = HashBiMap.create(CollectionBuilder.map(new HashMap<String, ChatPosition>(ChatPosition.Named.BY_NAME))
047            .put("boss_bar", (viewer, content) -> {
048                if (viewer instanceof Player player)
049                    bossBar(player).name(content);
050            })
051            .get()
052    );
053    /*
054      * -> display
055      seasons ->
056        -> time_dilation
057        -> climate ->
058          -> phenomena
059          -> temperature
060          -> fertility
061     */
062    private final PaperScheduler scheduler = new PaperScheduler(this);
063    private final Map<Player, BossBar> bossBars = new HashMap<>();
064    private BiomeInjector biomeInjector;
065    private ImageColors foliageColors;
066    private GrassColors grassColors;
067    private boolean allowSaving;
068
069    private final Display display = new Display(this);
070    private final TimeDilation timeDilation = new TimeDilation(this);
071    private final Seasons seasons = new Seasons(this);
072    private final Climate climate = new Climate(this);
073    private final Fertility fertility = new Fertility(this);
074    private final List<Feature<?>> features = Arrays.asList(
075            display, timeDilation, seasons, climate, fertility
076    );
077
078    public PaperScheduler scheduler() { return scheduler; }
079    public Map<Player, BossBar> bossBars() { return bossBars; }
080    public BiomeInjector biomeInjector() { return biomeInjector; }
081    public ImageColors foliageColors() { return foliageColors; }
082    public GrassColors grassColors() { return grassColors; }
083
084    public Display display() { return display; }
085    public TimeDilation timeDilation() { return timeDilation; }
086    public Seasons seasons() { return seasons; }
087    public Climate climate() { return climate; }
088    public Fertility fertility() { return fertility; }
089    public List<Feature<?>> features() { return features; }
090
091    public BossBar bossBar(Player player) {
092        return bossBars.computeIfAbsent(player, p -> {
093            BossBar bar = BossBar.bossBar(Component.empty(),
094                    setting(0f, ConfigurationNode::getFloat, "boss_bar", "progress"),
095                    setting(BossBar.Color.WHITE, (n, d) -> n.get(BossBar.Color.class, d), "boss_bar", "color"),
096                    setting(BossBar.Overlay.PROGRESS, (n, d) -> n.get(BossBar.Overlay.class, d), "boss_bar", "overlay"));
097            p.showBossBar(bar);
098            return bar;
099        });
100    }
101
102    public void removeBossBars() {
103        for (var entry : bossBars.entrySet()) {
104            entry.getKey().hideBossBar(entry.getValue());
105        }
106        bossBars.clear();
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public void onEnable() {
111        super.onEnable();
112        Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new DemeterListener(this), this);
113
114        try {
115            biomeInjector = new BiomeInjector();
116        } catch (NoSuchFieldException | IllegalAccessException e) {
117            log(Logging.Level.ERROR, e, "Could not set up biome injector");
118        }
119
120        protocol.manager().addPacketListener(new PacketAdapter(this,
121                PacketType.Play.Server.MAP_CHUNK, PacketType.Play.Server.LIGHT_UPDATE) {
122            @Override
123            public void onPacketSending(PacketEvent event) {
124                PacketType type = event.getPacketType();
125                if (type == PacketType.Play.Server.MAP_CHUNK)
126                    features.forEach(f -> f.mapChunk(event));
127            }
128        });
129    }
130
131    @Override
132    public void onDisable() {
133        super.onDisable();
134        removeBossBars();
135        if (biomeInjector != null) {
136            biomeInjector.uninjectAll();
137        }
138        save();
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    protected void configOptionsDefaults(TypeSerializerCollection.Builder serializers, ObjectMapper.Factory.Builder mapperFactory) {
143        super.configOptionsDefaults(serializers, mapperFactory);
144        serializers
145                .registerExact(ChatPosition.class, new ByKeySerializer<>(chatPositions))
146                .registerExact(TimeDilation.Factor.class, new TimeDilation.Factor.Serializer())
147                .registerExact(TimeDilation.CycleDuration.class, new TimeDilation.CycleDuration.Serializer())
148                .registerExact(Seasons.ColorModifier.class, new Seasons.ColorModifier.Serializer())
149                .registerExact(Fertility.RangedFactor.class, new Fertility.RangedFactor.Serializer());
150    }
151
152    public void save() {
153        if (!allowSaving)
154            return;
155        var loader = loader(file(PATH_STATE));
156        ConfigurationNode root;
157        try {
158            root = loader.load();
159        } catch (ConfigurateException e) {
160            root = loader.createNode();
161        }
162        for (var feature : features) {
163            ConfigurationNode featureRoot = root.node(feature.id());
164            try {
165                feature.save(featureRoot);
166            } catch (SerializationException e) {
167                log(Logging.Level.ERROR, e, "Could not save state for feature %s", feature.id());
168            }
169        }
170
171        try {
172            loader.save(root);
173        } catch (ConfigurateException e) {
174            log(Logging.Level.ERROR, e, "Could not save state");
175        }
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    public void load() {
180        super.load();
181        scheduler.cancel();
182        biomeInjector.uninjectAll();
183        features.forEach(Feature::disable);
184
185        try {
186            foliageColors = ImageColors.load(ImageIO.read(file(PATH_FOLIAGE)));
187        } catch (IOException e) {
188            log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not load foliage colors from %s", PATH_FOLIAGE);
189        }
190        try {
191            grassColors = new GrassColors(ImageColors.load(ImageIO.read(file(PATH_GRASS))));
192        } catch (IOException e) {
193            log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not load grass colors from %s", PATH_GRASS);
194        }
195
196        int enabled = 0;
197        for (var feature : features) {
198            String id = feature.id();
199            ConfigurationNode config = settings.root().node(id);
200            if (!config.virtual()) {
201                try {
202                    feature.configure(config);
203                } catch (Exception e) {
204                    log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not configure feature '%s'", id);
205                }
206                try {
207                    feature.enable();
208                    ++enabled;
209                } catch (Exception e) {
210                    log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not enable feature '%s'", id);
211                }
212                log(Logging.Level.VERBOSE, "Enabled feature %s", id);
213            }
214        }
215        log(Logging.Level.INFO, "Enabled %d feature(s)", enabled);
216
217        if (file(PATH_STATE).exists()) {
218            allowSaving = false;
219            var loader = loader(file(PATH_STATE));
220            try {
221                ConfigurationNode node = loader.load();
222                for (var feature : features) {
223                    try {
224                        feature.load(node.node(feature.id()));
225                    } catch (SerializationException e) {
226                        log(Logging.Level.ERROR, e, "Could not load state for feature %s", feature.id());
227                    }
228                }
229                allowSaving = true;
230            } catch (ConfigurateException e) {
231                log(Logging.Level.ERROR, "Could not load state");
232            }
233        } else {
234            allowSaving = true;
235        }
236
237        long autosaveInterval = setting(Duration.duration(1000 * 30), (n, d) -> n.get(Duration.class, d), "autosave_interval").ms();
238        if (autosaveInterval > 0) {
239            scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
240                if (allowSaving)
241                    save();
242            }, autosaveInterval));
243        }
244    }
245
246    @Override
247    public void reload() {
248        removeBossBars();
249        save();
250        super.reload();
251    }
252
253    @Override
254    protected DemeterCommand createCommand() throws Exception {
255        return new DemeterCommand(this);
256    }
257}
